panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (((count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) by (cpu))) - avg(sum by (mode)(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode='idle',type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}[5m])))) * 100) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) by (cpu))

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (1 min average)

targets.expr: avg(node_load1{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) /  count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) by (cpu)) * 100

panels.title: CPU Load 1m

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)

targets.expr: avg(node_load5{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) /  count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) by (cpu)) * 100

panels.title: CPU Load 5m

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

targets.expr: avg(node_load15{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) /  count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) by (cpu)) * 100

panels.title: CPU Load 15m

targets.expr: ((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) / (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} )) * 100

((node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} - node_memory_SwapFree_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) / (node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} )) * 100
node_time_seconds{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} - node_boot_time_seconds{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}
(1 - (avg by(instance, job, env, nameserver, gamecode) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname",mode="idle"}[5m]))))*100

node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"})
node_memory_Cached_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}

100 - ((node_memory_MemFree_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"} + node_memory_Cached_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{type=~"$type", zone=~"$zone", hostname=~"$hostname"}) * 100

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic

targets.legendFormat: CurrEstab - TCP Connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT
InErrors - Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application
NoPorts - Datagrams received on a port with no listener
